# Introduction
This is Junyan Zhu's personal website. I received a BS degree in Biology and Psychology from [University of Wisconsin-madison](https://www.wisc.edu/) in 2020. I am currently a first-year master student majoring in Biostatistics at Mailman School of Public School at [Columbia University](https://www.columbia.edu/).
